wikipedia_page.main:
Jules Dang-Akodo (born 2 May 1996) is a Cameroonian-born British basketball player for the Cheshire Phoenix and the Great Britain national team.He participated at the EuroBasket 2017.On 18 October 2019 Dang-Akodo signed with the London Lions in England for the 2019–20 BBL season. He averaged 7 points and 3 rebounds per game. 
On 5 August 2020, he re-signed with the team for the 2020–21 BBL season.On 3 June 2021, Dang-Akodo signed with Cheshire Phoenix for the 2021–22 BBL season. On 19 November 2021, Dang-Akodo signed with Surrey Scorchers for the remainder of the BBL Championship.
